duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform trading functions in equity and fixed income securities.
Build and generate trading reports for management and compliance.
Research investment opportunities and assist with ongoing surveillance of bond issuer credit quality.
Assist with the development of investment strategy for fixed income portfolios, including research and implementation of investment opportunities.
Manage trading error process including written summary, adjustments to client and firm accounts, as well as reporting to investment committee.
Serve as a backup to other traders.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate degree in related field; Experience may replace education requirement. Three to five years of securities industry experience. Preferred experience in fixed income. Previous trading experience required. FINRA Series 7 securities license required or be willing to obtain within the first year.
